subtitleNullable: 12k Football news articles scraped from the internet
descriptionNullable:
## This dataset contains around 12k rows. The attributes include:
1. title -> Article content
2. link-> Article URL
3. publish_time > Article published date
4. content -> Article content
5. author -> Article author

### This dataset has been scraped from multiple websites namely Goal.com, skysports, tribuna.com etc using selenium and bs4
#### The content in the dataset ranges from 2021-2024
